department.dept_long_name: Committee on Degrees in Studies of Women, Gender, and Sexuality
department.dept_short_name: Studies of Women, Gender, and Sexuality

course.course_group: Studies of Women, Gender, and Sexuality
course.title: Introduction to WGS: Graduate Proseminar
course.description: This course offers an introduction to theoretical themes in the study of women, gender, and sexuality. Special attention is given to recent critical debates that have (re)energized the field and that cross disciplinary boundaries. The course also addresses matters of professional development.
course.notes: Will count as the Graduate Proseminar for the PhD secondary field requirement in WGS.
